response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but its worth to you is even greater. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value of $1,200,000, and we believe it presents a fantastic investment for you. We understand that this is a substantial amount, but we are confident that the quality and benefits of the product justify this price. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
